code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var authSlice=createSlice({name:'auth',initialState:{token:null},reducers:{setCredentials:function setCredentials(state,action){var accessToken=action.payload.accessToken;state.token=accessToken;},logOut:function logOut(state,action){state.token=null;}}});var _authSlice$actions=authSlice.actions,setCredentials=_authSlice$actions.setCredentials,logOut=_authSlice$actions.logOut;export{setCredentials,logOut};export default authSlice.reducer;export var selectCurrentToken=function selectCurrentToken(state){return state.auth.token;};
